decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (RV/13/W4/01, 507200, Received: 22/02/2017. Flood Risk Assessment, Received: 17/03/2017. Tree Surgeon Letter, Received: 31/05/2017. AR/13TW/02 Rev 2, Received: 01/06/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - A root barrier shall be installed as part of construction between the extension hereby approved and the adjacent Cherry tree and retained on completion.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension with a roof lantern to the flat
